name: Beep Prepared
summary: Wile E. Coyote tries and fails to catch the Road Runner using his foot extended to trip, an arrow, a hole in the road, a winged-rocket outfit, two electronically activated machine guns, and a super magnet.
info:
• 中文名: 哔哔准备
  • 上映年度: 1961-11-11
  • 片长: 6分钟
  • 类型: 喜剧 / 动画 / 短片 / 家庭
  • 导演: Chuck Jones / Maurice Noble
  • 编剧: John W. Dunn、Chuck Jones
  • 主演: Wile E. Coyote / Road Runner
